isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - CAB - TILT: 9600 AND 9700 SLEEPER AND NON-SLEEPER CABS - SHEET METAL REPAIRS - MINOR REPAIRS

svcproc.title: MINOR REPAIRS
svcproc.para: Whenever the cab encounters minor damage (dents, small punctures or tears, etc.), a Monobolt riveted sheet aluminum patch or fiberglass repair is recommended. These repairs can be quite satisfactory providing the limits of the repair are understood and the latest material and techniques are used. MlG-weld aluminum repairs to cab side panels can also be used for minor damage providing the weld causes no internal stresses or weakening of the panel. Also, make sure the weld or weld heat does not affect the structural members of cab. Minor or cosmetic repairs should not be used where the structural integrity of cab might be impaired.
